tooltip.compact-storage.row_upgrade_desc: Use this on a Compact Chest to add an extra row
tooltip.compact-storage.column_upgrade_d: Use this on a Compact Chest to add an extra column
tooltip.compact-storage.upgrade_backpack: Can also be applied to backpacks in your off-hand
tooltip.compact-storage.upgrade_error: To upgrade a backpack, it must be placed in your off-hand
tooltip.compact-storage.fully_upgraded_r: This backpack has reached the maximum number of rows
tooltip.compact-storage.fully_upgraded_c: This backpack has reached the maximum number of columns
compact-storage.text.too_many_rows: This chest has reached the maximum amount of rows
compact-storage.text.too_many_columns: This chest has reached the maximum amount of columns
